triples.name: Convention (norm)
triples.relevance: Social conventions are central to the paper's investigation of how AI agents establish shared communication norms.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs form the foundation of the AI agents studied in demonstrating autonomous social convention emergence.

triples.name: Cognitive bias
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates how collective biases emerge from unbiased individual agents, introducing novel insights into bias formation.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP is the underlying mechanism through which LLM agents communicate and coordinate in the study.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: AI agents are the core subject of the study, investigating their autonomous development of social conventions.

triples.name: Coordination game
triples.relevance: Coordination games provide the theoretical framework for understanding how agents achieve social convention emergence.
